data.description: Linguistic and sociolinguistic change in English from its beginnings to the present.
data.title: HISTORY OF THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE

data.description: Understanding language change; relation of variation and change to formal properties of human language; consideration of linguistic typology, basic concepts and methods of diachronic analysis. Topics include: language classification and reconstruction; language and social identity, geography, and power; language contact; registers; writing systems.
data.title: HISTORICAL LINGUISTICS
